messages.title: A MESSAGE FROM RUTH DAVIDSON
messages.content: With just a few days to go before the General Election on 8th June, more and more local people are deciding to give their votes to local candidate Nick Tulloch because he is best placed to beat the SNP here in Inverness, Nairn, Badenoch & Strathspey. Nick Tulloch is picking up the votes of Labour and Lib Dem supporters who know they have no chance in this seat but won't give up giving the SNP a free ride. So they are voting with the Scottish Conservatives to stop another unwanted and divisive independence referendum by voting for Scottish Conservative and Unionist at this election. The facts of this election are clear. Labour are in a mess. Divided and in third place across Scotland, they can't take on the SNP. And the Lib Dems are too weak to challenge them. The facts locally are clear too. Labour and the Lib Dems are out of the General Election race here. So only a vote for my candidate can beat the SNP and send Nicola Sturgeon a message she can't ignore. It all adds up to one thing. If you want to say NO to a second independence referendum and for the SNP to get back to growing our economy and make our area more vibrant, vote for Scottish Conservatives. The only party that can beat the SNP here in Inverness, Nairn, Badenoch & Strathspey.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Attract investment to the Highlands and regenerate our high streets and town centres
keyPolicies.policyDescription: We need to encourage businesses to start and develop and to work with local companies to create good quality, well-paid jobs.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Improve our local economy with a better bus network and more frequent services
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Our roads need investment – temporary pothole repairs just don't work. In today's world, high-speed broadband and mobile coverage is an essential service.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Protect our vital local hospital and GP services
keyPolicies.policyDescription: SNP centralisation of emergency services must be reversed and brought back to where local knowledge is greatest.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Properly fund schools with better facilities
keyPolicies.policyDescription: We want schools that provide the right environment for our children to learn and to enable them to pursue sport and other activities.
